title: 'American Crime' And 'The Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt' Highlight The TV Revolution
teaser: Tina Fey co-created the quirky comedy The Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt for Netflix; John Ridley made the emotionally raw drama American Crime for ABC. TV critic David Bianculli says they're both good.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
